tasks.title: Initialize Project and Configure Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with FastAPI, React, and TypeScript. Configure basic project structure, including folders for backend, frontend, and common utilities. Set up initial configurations for linting, formatting, and version control. Project structure includes comprehensive backend, frontend, infrastructure, and documentation setup.
tasks.details:
1. Created a new repository.
2. Initialized backend with FastAPI, including main.py, config.py, and structured directories (models/, routers/, services/).
3. Initialized frontend with React and TypeScript using Material-UI v6.
4. Configured ESLint, Prettier, and Git.
5. Set up Docker and Docker Compose for containerized deployment with PostgreSQL, Redis, and Qdrant services.
6. Created comprehensive README.md with setup instructions, project structure documentation, development workflow guidelines, and environment variable documentation.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the project structure is correctly set up and that the initial configurations for linting, formatting, and version control are working as expected. tasks.title: Design Database Schema and Define SQLAlchemy Models
tasks.description: Design the PostgreSQL database schema for storing metadata related to uploaded documents, including file names, upload dates, format, and processing status. Define SQLAlchemy models to interact with the database.

1. Design PostgreSQL schema with tables for documents and users.
2. Define SQLAlchemy models representing the database tables.
3. Implement database connection and migration scripts.
tasks.testStrategy: Create and apply database migrations. Verify that the database schema is correctly created and that SQLAlchemy models can interact with the database.

tasks.title: Implement File Upload API with Chunking and WebSocket
tasks.description: Implement the backend API endpoint for handling file uploads. Use FastAPI to create an endpoint that supports chunked uploads, SHA-256 checksum verification, and S3 pre-signed URLs for secure uploads. Implement WebSocket for real-time progress updates.
tasks.details:
1. Implement FastAPI endpoint for file uploads.
2. Implement chunked upload logic with 5MB chunks.
3. Implement SHA-256 checksum verification to prevent duplicate uploads.
4. Integrate S3 pre-signed URLs for secure uploads.
5. Implement WebSocket for real-time progress updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Upload large files in chunks and verify that they are correctly assembled on the server. Verify that SHA-256 checksum verification prevents duplicate uploads. Verify that WebSocket updates are sent correctly during the upload process.

tasks.title: Integrate MarkItDown for Document Conversion
tasks.description: Integrate Microsoft MarkItDown library to convert uploaded documents (PDF, EPUB, TXT, DOCX) into structured Markdown format. Implement Celery tasks for asynchronous processing of large files. Ensure that the document structure (headings, paragraphs, tables, images) is preserved during the conversion.
tasks.details:
1. Integrate Microsoft MarkItDown library.
2. Implement Celery tasks for asynchronous document conversion.
3. Ensure document structure is preserved during conversion.
4. Implement error handling and retry mechanisms.
tasks.testStrategy: Upload documents in various formats and verify that they are correctly converted to Markdown format. Verify that the document structure is preserved during the conversion. Verify that Celery tasks are executed asynchronously.

tasks.title: Implement Text Splitting and Vectorize Content
tasks.description: Implement text splitting logic to divide the converted Markdown content into semantic chunks of 1-2k tokens. Use Qwen3-Embedding-8B to generate vector embeddings for each chunk. Store the embeddings in Qdrant vector database.
tasks.details:
1. Implement text splitting logic to divide Markdown content into 1-2k token chunks.
2. Use Qwen3-Embedding-8B to generate vector embeddings.
3. Store embeddings in Qdrant vector database.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the text splitting logic correctly divides the Markdown content into semantic chunks. Verify that Qwen3-Embedding-8B generates vector embeddings for each chunk. Verify that the embeddings are stored correctly in Qdrant.

tasks.title: Implement Hybrid Search Strategy
tasks.description: Implement a hybrid search strategy that combines vector search and inverted index search to retrieve relevant document fragments. Optimize the search strategy for accuracy and performance.

2. Implement inverted index search.

tasks.testStrategy: Test the hybrid search strategy with various queries and verify that it retrieves relevant document fragments. Measure the accuracy and performance of the search strategy.
